about_the_game:
Quantum Loop is a short non-linear space exploration game where you play as a galactic agent sent on a mission across time to solve an existential threat to the universe: the Asteroid Crisis.

Explore, dodge, and zoom your way around the quadrant, meeting quirky characters and completing intertwining quests that you're left to solve however you'd like. Exploit everything you can learn about the quadrant to solve the asteroid crisis and save the universe!

Every life matters! - Your mission takes place within a time loop!

If you hit an asteroid, it's game over. But your knowledge stays with you! Exploit what you can learn about the world to reach success!

Uncover the quadrant!

The game world is completely open, and you're free to explore however you like, so get out there and see what you discover!

Time is running out!

The asteroids are overrunning the quadrant. You'll have to act fast to solve the crisis before it's too late!

Exploit interwoven questlines!

You're let loose to complete quests however you'd like, and nearly everything in the game has multiple purposes. Use your wits to find innovative ways to complete your objectives!

Make your own choices and play your way!

Will you buy a shiny new laser rifle to help break up the asteroids? Or will you save your credits and rely on your zero-g flying skills? Will you help out an astronaut in need? Or hold onto your supplies for your mission?

Stop the asteroids!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit required
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit required
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen 5, equivalent or better. ~3Ghz or greater.
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Additional Notes: Performance mostly affected by single-core CPU speed

short_description: In this short non-linear adventure across space and time, dodge, explore, and zoom your way around the quadrant, completing intertwining objectives however you choose! If you fail, the mission resets... But what you learn stays with you! Exploit your knowledge to save the universe!
